sections.heading: Recompiled.Section 9-15C-2 - Recompiled.Section 9-15C-3 - Recompiled.Section 9-15C-4 - Recompiled.Section 9-15C-5 - Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2005, ch. 219, § 1; 2006, ch. 19, § 1; 1978 Comp., § 9-15C-1, recompiled and amended as § 12-16-1 by Laws 2023, ch. 144, § 1.

Recompilations.— Laws 2023, ch. 144, § 1 recompiled and amended former 9-15C-1 NMSA 1978 as 12-16-1 NMSA 1978, effective July 1, 2023.
